page.title: 05One Family Weekday
page.content: I,{Mary Stead,}wake up at 7 o'clock and prepare breakfast.We all eat bread and jam with coffee.My husband is a doctor and works in{Haworth.}I have two children.They go to{Stanbury {Primary School.}I have a part time job in a shop.I only work on Tuesdays.The shop is a post office but it is also used as a general store. After work I collect my children from school.We have a cup of tea.The children then play in the garden with their pets.We have a dog ,a rabbit and a cat.I often do some knitting at this time. In our garden we grow flowers and vegetables.Our house is a stone cottage.It was built in{1870.}We like living in{Stanbury.}We hope to live here all our lives.
